title: [Large-Scale] ENA-Based Instructional Design for Strengthening Online Collaborative Problem-Solving Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic online collaboration tools and practical experience in social sector work
context.additional_context: Practicing professionals learn to analyze complex communication patterns occurring in online collaboration for solving diverse social problems.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze social and cognitive interaction patterns occurring in various online collaborative scenarios using ENA (Epistemic Network Analysis).
Learners can comparatively evaluate idea negotiation and resource-sharing strategies during collaborative problem-solving processes.
Based on ENA analysis results, learners can develop action plans to improve their own collaborative processes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
